name: Muri Ghonto

ingredients.name: Ginger (Ada)
ingredients.quantity: 1.5 inches ground to a fine paste

steps: Wash the rice thoroughly and dry it up by spreading it on a piece of newspaper.
Marinate the fish with turmeric powder and salt, deep fry till reddish colour and keep aside.
In the remaining oil add bay leaves and fry for a few seconds.
Add onion and stirfry till onion turns into golden brown colour.
Add ginger paste, garlic paste, turmeric powder, cumin powder and red chillie powder and stirfry till oil seperates from the mixture.
Add the rice and cook for 5 minutes in a low flame.
Increase the flame and add approximately 700ml of water and boil till the rice is cooked.
Add the fish, sugar and salt and blend the mixture well stirring continuously.
Add ghee and garam masala and stir continuously till the excess water evaporates and the mixture acquires a thick consistency.
